title: Pot Stocks Gain on Surprise Earnings Beat by Aphria
text:
Pot Stocks Gain on Surprise Earnings Beat by Aphria

Stock Markets 44 minutes ago (Oct 16, 2019 02:52)

Investing.com - Pot stocks were higher on Tuesday after upbeat earnings results from Aphria. Aphria Inc (NYSE: ) stock surged 23% in midday trade after the Canadian marijuana company surprised investors by posting a profit instead of a loss during its fiscal first quarter. The company reported a net income of C$16.4 million ($12.4 million), or $0.07 cents per share. Revenue was at C$126.1 million, below the C$131.0 million consensus. But the company reiterated full-year revenue guidance. The results helped uplight other pot stocks, with Cronos Group (NASDAQ: ), Canopy Growth (NYSE: ) and Aurora Cannabis (NYSE: ) gaining 5%.
